characters.story: The woman bends down drooping after painstaking work - auntie, uncle's wife!
The fabric bends down drooping - a blanket, a rug, and throw.
"HAO?" he questions curiously - milli, a tiny fraction?
"HAO!" he commands sharply - to consume, waste, and deplete the chicken!
"GUNG!" the Christmas tree and well sing cheerfully - to till, plow, and cultivate the land!
"JEE?" the bamboo, Christmas tree, and times past question curiously - records, documents, and clan archives?
"JYEH!" the flowers command sharply - an excuse, a pretext to forget!
"TWOH!" the hand sings cheerfully - to hold up and support like a motorcycle, so cocky!
"WAY!" the field commands sharply - to be afraid of, fear, and dread!
"WAY!" the mouth commands sharply when afraid - Hello, hey to greet!
"JAHNG!" the flesh and long command sharply - bloated, swollen, and puffy!
"JAHNG!" the cloth commands sharply - a tent, canopy, and shelter!
"SIH!" the four commands sharply - IV, fraud-proof numeral, and wanton tolerance!
"HOO?" the hair questions curiously about recklessness - a beard, whiskers for the difficult uncle?
"SUNG!" he sings cheerfully - loose, relaxed, and slack!
"PUNG?" the companion bird questions curiously - a roc, giant and mythical?
"MING?" the bird questions curiously - to twitter and chirp like Naruto?
"HUNG?" the Yangtze bird questions curiously - a swan, elegant waterfowl?
